dashboards_data.name: CNAPP - Container/VM Image Protection/Scan Status
dashboards_data.description: Status of discovered Images protection and scanning, VM Images, Container Image Registries, Repositories and Container Images

data.phrase:
dataset = asset_inventory
| filter xdm.asset.type.category = "VM Image"
// | filter xdm.asset.cloud.region != null
| filter xdm.asset.realm != "ON_PREM"
| alter Group_ID = coalesce(xdm.asset.tags -> ["Group_ID"], "None")
| alter Application = coalesce(xdm.asset.tags -> ["Application"], "None")
| alter ApplicationCI = coalesce(xdm.asset.tags -> ["ApplicationCI"], "None")
| alter Application_Owner = coalesce(xdm.asset.tags -> ["Application_Owner"], "None")
| alter Environment = coalesce(xdm.asset.tags -> ["Environment"], "None")
| alter Environment= uppercase(Environment)

| alter Function = coalesce(xdm.asset.tags -> ["Function"], "None")
| filter Group_ID in ($FilteredGroup_ID)
| filter Application in ($FilteredApplication)
| filter Application_Owner in ($FilteredApplication_Owner)
| filter Environment in ($FilteredEnvironment)
| filter xdm.asset.realm in ($FilteredRealm)
| filter xdm.asset.provider in ($FilteredProvider)
| filter (Function not contains """SDWAN""" and Function not contains """Firewall""" and Function not contains """Panorama""") 
| alter scanType = xdm.asset.raw_fields -> CWP["analysis-info_csa_vulnerability_analyzer"].scanner_type
| alter agentType =  xdm.asset.normalized_fields -> ["xdm.agent.type"]
| alter Agentless = xdm.asset.raw_fields -> CWP["analysis-info_agentless_vulnerability_analyzer"].scanner_type
//| alter K8S_Cluster = xdm.asset.tags -> ["eks:cluster-name"]
//| alter K8S_Cluster = xdm.asset.tags -> ["goog-k8s-cluster-name"]
| alter K8S_Cluster = xdm.kubernetes.cluster.name

| alter Backup = xdm.asset.tags -> ["aws:backup:source-resource"]
// | alter Protected = if (Agentless = "agentless", "Agentless Scan", xdm.image.visibility = "PUBLIC", "Not Supported", agentType = null and Backup != null, "Not Scanned (Backup)", agentType = null , "Not Scanned") 
| alter Protected = if (Agentless = "agentless" and Backup != null, "Agentless Scan (Backup)", Agentless = "agentless", "Agentless Scan", xdm.image.visibility = "PUBLIC", "Not Supported", Agentless = null and Backup != null, "Not Scanned (Backup)", Agentless = null , "Not Scanned/Protected") 

| filter Protected in ($FilteredProtected)

| fields xdm.asset.name as Name, xdm.asset.strong_id as ResourceID, xdm.asset.provider as Cloud, xdm.asset.cloud.region as Region, xdm.asset.realm as Cloud_Account, Protected, agentType, Function

| comp count (Name ) as VM_Images by protected
| sort desc VM_Images   


| view graph type = pie xaxis = protected yaxis = VM_Images valuecolor("Not Scanned/Protected","#ec0101") valuecolor("Agentless Scan","#5400ff") valuecolor("Not Supported","#f8ff00")

dataset = asset_inventory
| filter xdm.asset.type.name in ("Container Image", "Runtime Image")
| alter 
    agentless_image_scan = xdm.asset.raw_fields -> CWP["scan_information_agentless_caa"].type,
    agent_image_scan = xdm.asset.raw_fields -> CWP["scan_information_csa_caa"].type,
    Agentless_Scan_Status = xdm.asset.raw_fields -> CWP["scan_information_agentless_caa"]["collected_types"][],
    CSA_Scan_Status = xdm.asset.raw_fields -> CWP["scan_information_csa_caa"]["collected_types"][],
    
    Agent_Scan_Status = xdm.asset.raw_fields -> CWP["analysis-info_csa_compliance_publisher"].scan_analysis_result
| alter Protected = "Not Scanned/Protected"
| alter Protected = if(Agent_Scan_Status = "success", "Agent Scan", Protected)
| alter Protected = if(agent_image_scan = "csa", "Agent Scan", Protected)
| alter Protected = if(Agentless_Scan_Status != null, "Agentless Scan", Protected)
// | alter Scan_Status = if(Agentless_Scan_Status != null, 
//                           arraystring(Agentless_Scan_Status, ", "), 
//                           Agent_Scan_Status)
| alter Group_ID = coalesce(xdm.asset.tags -> ["Group_ID"], "None")
| alter Application = coalesce(xdm.asset.tags -> ["Application"], "None")
| alter ApplicationCI = coalesce(xdm.asset.tags -> ["ApplicationCI"], "None")
| alter Application_Owner = coalesce(xdm.asset.tags -> ["Application_Owner"], "None")
| alter Environment = coalesce(xdm.asset.tags -> ["Environment"], "None")
| alter Environment= uppercase(Environment)
| alter Function = coalesce(xdm.asset.tags -> ["Function"], "None")
| filter Protected in ($FilteredProtected)

| filter Group_ID in ($FilteredGroup_ID)
| filter Application in ($FilteredApplication)
| filter Application_Owner in ($FilteredApplication_Owner)
| filter Environment in ($FilteredEnvironment)
| filter xdm.asset.realm in ($FilteredRealm)
| filter xdm.asset.provider in ($FilteredProvider)

| fields Group_ID, Application, ApplicationCI, Application_Owner, Environment, Function, Protected, Agentless_Scan_Status, Agent_Scan_Status, CSA_Scan_Status, xdm.asset.name as Name, xdm.asset.strong_id as ResourceID, xdm.asset.type.name as Type, xdm.asset.provider as Cloud, xdm.asset.realm as Cloud_Account, xdm.asset.cloud.region as Cloud_Region, xdm.asset.last_observed as Last_Observed
| comp count (Name ) as Container_Images by protected

| sort desc Protected 




| view graph type = pie xaxis = protected yaxis = Container_Images

dataset = asset_inventory
| filter xdm.asset.type.name in ("Container Registry")
| alter Scan_Status  = xdm.asset.raw_fields -> CWP["analysis-info__compliance_publisher"].scan_analysis_result
| alter AzurePublic = xdm.asset.raw_fields -> ["Platform Discovery"]["properties"].publicNetworkAccess
| alter AwsPublic = xdm.asset.raw_fields -> ["Platform Discovery"].public
| alter Public  = if (AzurePublic != null, AzurePublic,  AwsPublic != null , AwsPublic) 
| alter Repositories = xdm.asset.raw_fields -> ["Platform Discovery"]["repositories"][]
| alter Protected = if (Scan_Status = "success", "Agentless Scan", Scan_Status = null , "Not Scanned/Protected") 
| alter Group_ID = coalesce(xdm.asset.tags -> ["Group_ID"], "None")
| alter Application = coalesce(xdm.asset.tags -> ["Application"], "None")
| alter ApplicationCI = coalesce(xdm.asset.tags -> ["ApplicationCI"], "None")
| alter Application_Owner = coalesce(xdm.asset.tags -> ["Application_Owner"], "None")
| alter Environment = coalesce(xdm.asset.tags -> ["Environment"], "None")
| alter Environment= uppercase(Environment)
| alter Function = coalesce(xdm.asset.tags -> ["Function"], "None")
| filter Protected in ($FilteredProtected)
| filter Group_ID in ($FilteredGroup_ID)
| filter Application in ($FilteredApplication)
| filter Application_Owner in ($FilteredApplication_Owner)
| filter Environment in ($FilteredEnvironment)
| filter xdm.asset.realm in ($FilteredRealm)
| filter xdm.asset.provider in ($FilteredProvider)
| fields Protected,  Public, xdm.asset.name as Name,  xdm.asset.strong_id as ResourceID, xdm.asset.type.name as Type, xdm.asset.provider as Regitry_Type, xdm.asset.realm as Cloud_Account, Repositories, xdm.asset.tags as Tags, xdm.asset.last_observed as Last_Observed
| comp count (Name ) as Registries by protected
| sort desc Registries 


| view graph type = pie xaxis = protected yaxis = Registries valuecolor("Not Scanned/Protected","#ec0101") valuecolor("Agentless Scan","#5400ff")

dataset = asset_inventory
| filter xdm.asset.type.name in ("Container Image Repository")
| alter Scan_Status  = xdm.asset.raw_fields -> CWP["analysis-info__compliance_publisher"].scan_analysis_result
| alter Public  = xdm.asset.raw_fields -> ["Platform Discovery"].public
| alter registryURL  = xdm.asset.raw_fields -> CWP["discovery_data"].registryURL
| alter Protected = "Agentless Scan"
| alter Group_ID = coalesce(xdm.asset.tags -> ["Group_ID"], "None")
| alter Application = coalesce(xdm.asset.tags -> ["Application"], "None")
| alter ApplicationCI = coalesce(xdm.asset.tags -> ["ApplicationCI"], "None")
| alter Application_Owner = coalesce(xdm.asset.tags -> ["Application_Owner"], "None")
| alter Environment = coalesce(xdm.asset.tags -> ["Environment"], "None")
| alter Environment= uppercase(Environment)
| filter Protected in ($FilteredProtected)

| filter Group_ID in ($FilteredGroup_ID)
| filter Application in ($FilteredApplication)
| filter Application_Owner in ($FilteredApplication_Owner)
| filter Environment in ($FilteredEnvironment)
| filter xdm.asset.realm in ($FilteredRealm)
| filter xdm.asset.provider in ($FilteredProvider)

| fields Group_ID, Application, ApplicationCI, Application_Owner, Environment, Protected, Scan_Status, Public, registryURL, xdm.asset.name as Name, xdm.asset.strong_id as ResourceID, xdm.asset.type.name as Type, xdm.asset.provider as Registry_Type, xdm.asset.realm as Cloud_Account, xdm.asset.cloud.region as Cloud_Region, xdm.asset.id as AssetID, xdm.asset.last_observed as Last_Observed

| comp count (Name ) as Repositories by protected
| sort desc Repositories   








| view graph type = pie xaxis = protected yaxis = Repositories valuecolor("Agentless Scan","#5400ff")

dataset = asset_inventory
| filter xdm.asset.type.name in ("Registry Image")
// | alter K8s_Agent  = xdm.asset.raw_fields -> CWP["analysis-info_k8s_compliance_publisher"].scan_analysis_result
| alter repositoryName  = xdm.asset.raw_fields -> CWP["discovery_data"].repositoryName
| alter registryURL  = xdm.asset.raw_fields -> CWP["discovery_data"].registryURL
| alter Labels  = xdm.asset.raw_fields -> CWP["discovery_data"]["config"].Labels
| alter imageTags  = xdm.asset.raw_fields -> CWP["discovery_data"].imageTags[] 
| alter Architecture  = xdm.asset.raw_fields -> CWP["discovery_data"].architecture
| alter OS  = xdm.asset.raw_fields -> CWP["discovery_data"].os
| alter image_scan  = xdm.asset.raw_fields -> CWP["scan_information_container_images_registry_caa"].type
| alter Scan_Status  = xdm.asset.raw_fields -> CWP["scan_information_container_images_registry_caa"]["collected_types"][]
| alter Protected = if (Scan_Status != null, "Agentless Scan", image_scan = null , "Not Scanned/Protected") 
| alter Group_ID = coalesce(xdm.asset.tags -> ["Group_ID"], "None")
| alter Application = coalesce(xdm.asset.tags -> ["Application"], "None")
| alter ApplicationCI = coalesce(xdm.asset.tags -> ["ApplicationCI"], "None")
| alter Application_Owner = coalesce(xdm.asset.tags -> ["Application_Owner"], "None")
| alter Environment = coalesce(xdm.asset.tags -> ["Environment"], "None")
| alter Environment= uppercase(Environment)
| alter Function = coalesce(xdm.asset.tags -> ["Function"], "None")
| filter Protected in ($FilteredProtected)

| filter Group_ID in ($FilteredGroup_ID)
| filter Application in ($FilteredApplication)
| filter Application_Owner in ($FilteredApplication_Owner)
| filter Environment in ($FilteredEnvironment)
| filter xdm.asset.realm in ($FilteredRealm)
| filter xdm.asset.provider in ($FilteredProvider)

| fields Protected, repositoryName, registryURL, xdm.asset.name as Name, imageTags, Architecture, OS, xdm.asset.strong_id as ResourceID, xdm.asset.type.name as Type, xdm.asset.provider as Regitry_Type, xdm.asset.realm as Cloud_Account, xdm.asset.tags as Tags, xdm.asset.last_observed as Last_Observed

| comp count (Name ) as Images by protected

| sort desc Protected   


| view graph type = pie xaxis = protected yaxis = Images valuecolor("Agentless Scan","#0019ff") valuecolor("Not Scanned/Protected","#ec012c")

dataset = asset_inventory

| filter xdm.asset.type.category = "VM Image"
//| filter xdm.asset.provider  = "azure"
| alter scanType = xdm.asset.raw_fields -> CWP["analysis-info_csa_vulnerability_analyzer"].scanner_type
| alter agentType =  xdm.asset.normalized_fields -> ["xdm.agent.type"]
| alter Agentless = xdm.asset.raw_fields -> CWP["analysis-info_agentless_vulnerability_analyzer"].scanner_type
| alter Owner = xdm.asset.raw_fields -> ["Platform Discovery"]["image"].imageOwnerAlias
// | alter ImageTags = xdm.asset.raw_fields -> ["Platform Discovery"]["image"].tags[]
| alter Platform = xdm.asset.raw_fields -> ["Platform Discovery"]["image"].platformDetails
| alter Backup = xdm.asset.tags -> ["aws:backup:source-resource"]

| alter Group_ID = coalesce(xdm.asset.tags -> ["Group_ID"], "None")
| alter Application = coalesce(xdm.asset.tags -> ["Application"], "None")
| alter ApplicationCI = coalesce(xdm.asset.tags -> ["ApplicationCI"], "None")
| alter Application_Owner = coalesce(xdm.asset.tags -> ["Application_Owner"], "None")
| alter Environment = coalesce(xdm.asset.tags -> ["Environment"], "None")
| alter Environment= uppercase(Environment)
| alter Function = coalesce(xdm.asset.tags -> ["Function"], "None")
| filter Group_ID in ($FilteredGroup_ID)
| filter Application in ($FilteredApplication)
| filter Application_Owner in ($FilteredApplication_Owner)
| filter Environment in ($FilteredEnvironment)
| filter xdm.asset.realm in ($FilteredRealm)
| filter xdm.asset.provider in ($FilteredProvider)
| alter Protected = if (Agentless = "agentless" and Backup != null, "Agentless Scan (Backup)", Agentless = "agentless", "Agentless Scan", xdm.image.visibility = "PUBLIC", "Not Supported", Agentless = null and Backup != null, "Not Scanned (Backup)", Agentless = null , "Not Scanned/Protected") 
| filter Protected in ($FilteredProtected)

| fields   Protected, xdm.image.visibility as Visibility, Owner, Backup, Platform, xdm.asset.name as Name, xdm.asset.strong_id as ResourceID, xdm.asset.type.name as Type, xdm.asset.provider as Cloud, xdm.asset.cloud.region as Region, xdm.asset.realm as Cloud_Account, xdm.image.architecture as Architecture, xdm.asset.tags as Tags, xdm.asset.last_observed as Last_Observed, Group_ID, Application, ApplicationCI, Application_Owner, Environment, Function, xdm.asset.id as asset_id

dataset = asset_inventory
| filter xdm.asset.type.name in ("Container Image", "Runtime Image")
| alter 
    agentless_image_scan = xdm.asset.raw_fields -> CWP["scan_information_agentless_caa"].type,
    agent_image_scan = xdm.asset.raw_fields -> CWP["scan_information_csa_caa"].type,
    Agentless_Scan_Status = xdm.asset.raw_fields -> CWP["scan_information_agentless_caa"]["collected_types"][],
    CSA_Scan_Status = xdm.asset.raw_fields -> CWP["scan_information_csa_caa"]["collected_types"][],
    
    Agent_Scan_Status = xdm.asset.raw_fields -> CWP["analysis-info_csa_compliance_publisher"].scan_analysis_result
| alter Protected = "Not Scanned/Protected"
| alter Protected = if(Agent_Scan_Status = "success", "Agent Scan", Protected)
| alter Protected = if(agent_image_scan = "csa", "Agent Scan", Protected)
| alter Protected = if(Agentless_Scan_Status != null, "Agentless Scan", Protected)
// | alter Scan_Status = if(Agentless_Scan_Status != null, 
//                           arraystring(Agentless_Scan_Status, ", "), 
//                           Agent_Scan_Status)
| alter Group_ID = coalesce(xdm.asset.tags -> ["Group_ID"], "None")
| alter Application = coalesce(xdm.asset.tags -> ["Application"], "None")
| alter ApplicationCI = coalesce(xdm.asset.tags -> ["ApplicationCI"], "None")
| alter Application_Owner = coalesce(xdm.asset.tags -> ["Application_Owner"], "None")
| alter Environment = coalesce(xdm.asset.tags -> ["Environment"], "None")
| alter Environment= uppercase(Environment)
| alter Function = coalesce(xdm.asset.tags -> ["Function"], "None")
| filter Protected in ($FilteredProtected)

| filter Group_ID in ($FilteredGroup_ID)
| filter Application in ($FilteredApplication)
| filter Application_Owner in ($FilteredApplication_Owner)
| filter Environment in ($FilteredEnvironment)
| filter xdm.asset.realm in ($FilteredRealm)
| filter xdm.asset.provider in ($FilteredProvider)

| fields  Protected, xdm.asset.name as Name,  xdm.asset.type.name as Type, xdm.asset.provider as Cloud, xdm.asset.realm as Cloud_Account, xdm.asset.cloud.region as Cloud_Region, Agentless_Scan_Status, Agent_Scan_Status, CSA_Scan_Status, xdm.asset.strong_id as ResourceID, xdm.asset.id as AssetID, xdm.asset.last_observed as Last_Observed, Group_ID, Application, ApplicationCI, Application_Owner, Environment, Function

dataset = asset_inventory
| filter xdm.asset.type.name in ("Container Registry")
| alter Scan_Status  = xdm.asset.raw_fields -> CWP["analysis-info__compliance_publisher"].scan_analysis_result
| alter AzurePublic = xdm.asset.raw_fields -> ["Platform Discovery"]["properties"].publicNetworkAccess
| alter AwsPublic = xdm.asset.raw_fields -> ["Platform Discovery"].public
| alter Public  = if (AzurePublic != null, AzurePublic,  AwsPublic != null , AwsPublic) 
| alter Repositories = xdm.asset.raw_fields -> ["Platform Discovery"]["repositories"][]
| alter Protected = if (Scan_Status = "success", "Agentless Scan", Scan_Status = null , "Not Scanned/Protected") 
| alter Group_ID = coalesce(xdm.asset.tags -> ["Group_ID"], "None")
| alter Application = coalesce(xdm.asset.tags -> ["Application"], "None")
| alter ApplicationCI = coalesce(xdm.asset.tags -> ["ApplicationCI"], "None")
| alter Application_Owner = coalesce(xdm.asset.tags -> ["Application_Owner"], "None")
| alter Environment = coalesce(xdm.asset.tags -> ["Environment"], "None")
| alter Environment= uppercase(Environment)
| alter Function = coalesce(xdm.asset.tags -> ["Function"], "None")
| filter Protected in ($FilteredProtected)
| filter Group_ID in ($FilteredGroup_ID)
| filter Application in ($FilteredApplication)
| filter Application_Owner in ($FilteredApplication_Owner)
| filter Environment in ($FilteredEnvironment)
| filter xdm.asset.realm in ($FilteredRealm)
| filter xdm.asset.provider in ($FilteredProvider)
| fields Protected,  Public, xdm.asset.name as Name,  xdm.asset.strong_id as ResourceID, xdm.asset.type.name as Type, xdm.asset.provider as Registry_Type, xdm.asset.realm as Cloud_Account, Repositories, xdm.asset.tags as Tags, xdm.asset.last_observed as Last_Observed

dataset = asset_inventory
| filter xdm.asset.type.name in ("Container Image Repository")
| alter Scan_Status  = xdm.asset.raw_fields -> CWP["analysis-info__compliance_publisher"].scan_analysis_result
| alter Public  = xdm.asset.raw_fields -> ["Platform Discovery"].public
| alter registryURL  = xdm.asset.raw_fields -> CWP["discovery_data"].registryURL
| alter Protected = if (Scan_Status = "success", "Agentless Scan", Scan_Status = null , "Not Scanned/Protected") 
| alter Group_ID = coalesce(xdm.asset.tags -> ["Group_ID"], "None")
| alter Application = coalesce(xdm.asset.tags -> ["Application"], "None")
| alter ApplicationCI = coalesce(xdm.asset.tags -> ["ApplicationCI"], "None")
| alter Application_Owner = coalesce(xdm.asset.tags -> ["Application_Owner"], "None")
| alter Environment = coalesce(xdm.asset.tags -> ["Environment"], "None")
| alter Environment= uppercase(Environment)
| alter Function = coalesce(xdm.asset.tags -> ["Function"], "None")
| alter Function_Handler  = xdm.asset.raw_fields -> ["Platform Discovery"].Handler
| filter Protected in ($FilteredProtected)

| filter Group_ID in ($FilteredGroup_ID)
| filter Application in ($FilteredApplication)
| filter Application_Owner in ($FilteredApplication_Owner)
| filter Environment in ($FilteredEnvironment)
| filter xdm.asset.realm in ($FilteredRealm)
| filter xdm.asset.provider in ($FilteredProvider)

| fields  Protected, Public, registryURL, xdm.asset.name as Name, xdm.asset.strong_id as ResourceID, xdm.asset.type.name as Type, xdm.asset.provider as Registry_Type, xdm.asset.realm as Cloud_Account, xdm.asset.cloud.region as Cloud_Region, xdm.asset.last_observed as Last_Observed, Group_ID, Application, ApplicationCI, Application_Owner, Environment, Function

dataset = asset_inventory
| filter xdm.asset.type.name in ("Registry Image")
// | filter xdm.asset.type.name in ("Runtime Image", "Build Image", "Registry Image")
| alter imageTags  = xdm.asset.raw_fields -> CWP["discovery_data"].imageTags[]
| alter CloudRepositoryName  = xdm.asset.raw_fields -> ["Platform Discovery"].repositoryName
| alter RepositoryName   = xdm.asset.raw_fields -> CWP["discovery_data"].repositoryName
| alter RepositoryName  = if (RepositoryName != null, RepositoryName,  CloudRepositoryName != null , CloudRepositoryName) 
| alter registryURL  = xdm.asset.raw_fields -> CWP["discovery_data"].registryURL
// | alter Labels  = xdm.asset.raw_fields -> ["Platform Discovery"]["config"].Labels
| alter Labels  = xdm.asset.raw_fields -> CWP["discovery_data"]["config"].Labels
// | alter imageTags  = xdm.asset.raw_fields -> ["Platform Discovery"].imageTags
| alter CloudImageTags  = xdm.asset.raw_fields -> ["Platform Discovery"].imageTags[] 
| alter imageTags  = if (imageTags != null, imageTags,  CloudImageTags != null , CloudImageTags) 
| alter Public  = xdm.asset.raw_fields -> ["Platform Discovery"].public
| alter Architecture  = xdm.asset.normalized_fields -> ["xdm.image.architecture"]
| alter Visibility  = xdm.asset.normalized_fields -> ["xdm.image.visibility"]
| alter ImageName  = xdm.asset.normalized_fields -> ["xdm.image.names"][]
| alter OS = xdm.asset.normalized_fields -> ["xdm.image.os"]
| alter  os_distribution = xdm.asset.normalized_fields -> ["xdm.image.os_distribution"]
| alter  os_family = xdm.asset.normalized_fields -> ["xdm.image.os_family"]
| alter  os_release = xdm.asset.normalized_fields -> ["xdm.image.os_release"]
| alter  specification_type = xdm.asset.normalized_fields -> ["xdm.image.specification_type"]
| alter  size = xdm.asset.normalized_fields -> ["xdm.image.size"]
| alter image_scan  = xdm.asset.raw_fields -> CWP["scan_information_container_images_registry_caa"].type
| alter Scan_Status  = xdm.asset.raw_fields -> CWP["scan_information_container_images_registry_caa"]["collected_types"][]
| alter Protected = if (Scan_Status != null, "Agentless Scan", image_scan = null , "Not Scanned/Protected")
| alter Group_ID = coalesce(xdm.asset.tags -> ["Group_ID"], "None")
| alter Application = coalesce(xdm.asset.tags -> ["Application"], "None")
| alter ApplicationCI = coalesce(xdm.asset.tags -> ["ApplicationCI"], "None")
| alter Application_Owner = coalesce(xdm.asset.tags -> ["Application_Owner"], "None")
| alter Environment = coalesce(xdm.asset.tags -> ["Environment"], "None")
| alter Environment= uppercase(Environment)
| alter Function = coalesce(xdm.asset.tags -> ["Function"], "None")
| filter Protected in ($FilteredProtected)
| filter Group_ID in ($FilteredGroup_ID)
| filter Application in ($FilteredApplication)
| filter Application_Owner in ($FilteredApplication_Owner)
| filter Environment in ($FilteredEnvironment)
| filter xdm.asset.realm in ($FilteredRealm)
| filter xdm.asset.provider in ($FilteredProvider)

| fields   Protected, Scan_Status, Visibility, Public, xdm.asset.provider as Cloud, xdm.asset.name as Name, ImageName, imageTags, RepositoryName, registryURL, xdm.asset.strong_id as ResourceID, xdm.asset.type.name as Type,xdm.asset.realm as Cloud_Account, xdm.asset.cloud.region as Cloud_Region, Architecture, specification_type, os_release, OS, os_distribution, os_family, size, Labels, xdm.asset.last_observed as Last_Observed

input_dict.xql:
dataset = asset_inventory 
| fields xdm.asset.realm
| dedup xdm.asset.realm
| sort asc xdm.asset.realm

dataset = asset_inventory 
| alter Group_ID = xdm.asset.tags -> ["Group_ID"]
| fields Group_ID
| dedup Group_ID
| sort asc Group_ID

data.phrase:
dataset = asset_inventory
| filter xdm.asset.type.name in ("Registry Image")
// | filter xdm.asset.type.name in ("Runtime Image", "Build Image", "Registry Image")
| alter imageTags  = xdm.asset.raw_fields -> CWP["discovery_data"].imageTags[]
| alter CloudRepositoryName  = xdm.asset.raw_fields -> ["Platform Discovery"].repositoryName
| alter RepositoryName   = xdm.asset.raw_fields -> CWP["discovery_data"].repositoryName
| alter RepositoryName  = if (RepositoryName != null, RepositoryName,  CloudRepositoryName != null , CloudRepositoryName) 
| alter registryURL  = xdm.asset.raw_fields -> CWP["discovery_data"].registryURL
// | alter Labels  = xdm.asset.raw_fields -> ["Platform Discovery"]["config"].Labels
| alter Labels  = xdm.asset.raw_fields -> CWP["discovery_data"]["config"].Labels
// | alter imageTags  = xdm.asset.raw_fields -> ["Platform Discovery"].imageTags
| alter CloudImageTags  = xdm.asset.raw_fields -> ["Platform Discovery"].imageTags[] 
| alter imageTags  = if (imageTags != null, imageTags,  CloudImageTags != null , CloudImageTags) 
| alter Public  = xdm.asset.raw_fields -> ["Platform Discovery"].public
| alter Architecture  = xdm.asset.normalized_fields -> ["xdm.image.architecture"]
| alter Visibility  = xdm.asset.normalized_fields -> ["xdm.image.visibility"]
| alter ImageName  = xdm.asset.normalized_fields -> ["xdm.image.names"][]
| alter OS = xdm.asset.normalized_fields -> ["xdm.image.os"]
| alter  os_distribution = xdm.asset.normalized_fields -> ["xdm.image.os_distribution"]
| alter  os_family = xdm.asset.normalized_fields -> ["xdm.image.os_family"]
| alter  os_release = xdm.asset.normalized_fields -> ["xdm.image.os_release"]
| alter  specification_type = xdm.asset.normalized_fields -> ["xdm.image.specification_type"]
| alter  size = xdm.asset.normalized_fields -> ["xdm.image.size"]
| alter image_scan  = xdm.asset.raw_fields -> CWP["scan_information_container_images_registry_caa"].type
| alter Scan_Status  = xdm.asset.raw_fields -> CWP["scan_information_container_images_registry_caa"]["collected_types"][]
| alter Protected = if (Scan_Status != null, "Agentless Scan", image_scan = null , "Not Scanned/Protected")
| alter Group_ID = coalesce(xdm.asset.tags -> ["Group_ID"], "None")
| alter Application = coalesce(xdm.asset.tags -> ["Application"], "None")
| alter ApplicationCI = coalesce(xdm.asset.tags -> ["ApplicationCI"], "None")
| alter Application_Owner = coalesce(xdm.asset.tags -> ["Application_Owner"], "None")
| alter Environment = coalesce(xdm.asset.tags -> ["Environment"], "None")
| alter Environment= uppercase(Environment)
| alter Function = coalesce(xdm.asset.tags -> ["Function"], "None")
| filter Protected in ($FilteredProtected)
| filter Group_ID in ($FilteredGroup_ID)
| filter Application in ($FilteredApplication)
| filter Application_Owner in ($FilteredApplication_Owner)
| filter Environment in ($FilteredEnvironment)
| filter xdm.asset.realm in ($FilteredRealm)
| filter xdm.asset.provider in ($FilteredProvider)

| fields   Protected, Scan_Status, Visibility, Public, xdm.asset.provider as Cloud, xdm.asset.name as Name, ImageName, imageTags, RepositoryName, registryURL, xdm.asset.strong_id as ResourceID, xdm.asset.type.name as Type,xdm.asset.realm as Cloud_Account, xdm.asset.cloud.region as Cloud_Region, Architecture, specification_type, os_release, OS, os_distribution, os_family, size, Labels, xdm.asset.last_observed as Last_Observed, xdm.asset.id as asset_id

dataset = asset_inventory
| filter xdm.asset.type.category = "VM Image"
// | filter xdm.asset.cloud.region != null
| filter xdm.asset.realm != "ON_PREM"
| alter Group_ID = coalesce(xdm.asset.tags -> ["Group_ID"], "None")
| alter Application = coalesce(xdm.asset.tags -> ["Application"], "None")
| alter ApplicationCI = coalesce(xdm.asset.tags -> ["ApplicationCI"], "None")
| alter Application_Owner = coalesce(xdm.asset.tags -> ["Application_Owner"], "None")
| alter Environment = coalesce(xdm.asset.tags -> ["Environment"], "None")
| alter Environment= uppercase(Environment)

| alter Function = coalesce(xdm.asset.tags -> ["Function"], "None")
| filter Group_ID in ($FilteredGroup_ID)
| filter Application in ($FilteredApplication)
| filter Application_Owner in ($FilteredApplication_Owner)
| filter Environment in ($FilteredEnvironment)
| filter xdm.asset.realm in ($FilteredRealm)
| filter xdm.asset.provider in ($FilteredProvider)
| filter (Function not contains """SDWAN""" and Function not contains """Firewall""" and Function not contains """Panorama""") 
| alter scanType = xdm.asset.raw_fields -> CWP["analysis-info_csa_vulnerability_analyzer"].scanner_type
| alter agentType =  xdm.asset.normalized_fields -> ["xdm.agent.type"]
| alter Agentless = xdm.asset.raw_fields -> CWP["analysis-info_agentless_vulnerability_analyzer"].scanner_type
//| alter K8S_Cluster = xdm.asset.tags -> ["eks:cluster-name"]
//| alter K8S_Cluster = xdm.asset.tags -> ["goog-k8s-cluster-name"]
| alter K8S_Cluster = xdm.kubernetes.cluster.name

| alter Backup = xdm.asset.tags -> ["aws:backup:source-resource"]
// | alter Protected = if (Agentless = "agentless", "Agentless Scan", xdm.image.visibility = "PUBLIC", "Not Supported", agentType = null and Backup != null, "Not Scanned (Backup)", agentType = null , "Not Scanned") 
| alter Protected = if (Agentless = "agentless" and Backup != null, "Agentless Scan (Backup)", Agentless = "agentless", "Agentless Scan", xdm.image.visibility = "PUBLIC", "Not Supported", Agentless = null and Backup != null, "Not Scanned (Backup)", Agentless = null , "Not Scanned/Protected") 

| filter Protected in ($FilteredProtected)

| fields xdm.asset.name as Name, xdm.asset.strong_id as ResourceID, xdm.asset.provider as Cloud, xdm.asset.cloud.region as Region, xdm.asset.realm as Cloud_Account, Protected, agentType, Function

| comp count (Name ) as VM_Images by protected
| sort desc VM_Images   


| view graph type = pie xaxis = protected yaxis = VM_Images valuecolor("Not Scanned/Protected","#ec0101") valuecolor("Agentless Scan","#5400ff") valuecolor("Not Supported","#f8ff00")

dataset = asset_inventory
| filter xdm.asset.type.name in ("Registry Image")
// | alter K8s_Agent  = xdm.asset.raw_fields -> CWP["analysis-info_k8s_compliance_publisher"].scan_analysis_result
| alter repositoryName  = xdm.asset.raw_fields -> CWP["discovery_data"].repositoryName
| alter registryURL  = xdm.asset.raw_fields -> CWP["discovery_data"].registryURL
| alter Labels  = xdm.asset.raw_fields -> CWP["discovery_data"]["config"].Labels
| alter imageTags  = xdm.asset.raw_fields -> CWP["discovery_data"].imageTags[] 
| alter Architecture  = xdm.asset.raw_fields -> CWP["discovery_data"].architecture
| alter OS  = xdm.asset.raw_fields -> CWP["discovery_data"].os
| alter image_scan  = xdm.asset.raw_fields -> CWP["scan_information_container_images_registry_caa"].type
| alter Scan_Status  = xdm.asset.raw_fields -> CWP["scan_information_container_images_registry_caa"]["collected_types"][]
| alter Protected = if (Scan_Status != null, "Agentless Scan", image_scan = null , "Not Scanned/Protected") 
| alter Group_ID = coalesce(xdm.asset.tags -> ["Group_ID"], "None")
| alter Application = coalesce(xdm.asset.tags -> ["Application"], "None")
| alter ApplicationCI = coalesce(xdm.asset.tags -> ["ApplicationCI"], "None")
| alter Application_Owner = coalesce(xdm.asset.tags -> ["Application_Owner"], "None")
| alter Environment = coalesce(xdm.asset.tags -> ["Environment"], "None")
| alter Environment= uppercase(Environment)
| alter Function = coalesce(xdm.asset.tags -> ["Function"], "None")
| filter Protected in ($FilteredProtected)

| filter Group_ID in ($FilteredGroup_ID)
| filter Application in ($FilteredApplication)
| filter Application_Owner in ($FilteredApplication_Owner)
| filter Environment in ($FilteredEnvironment)
| filter xdm.asset.realm in ($FilteredRealm)
| filter xdm.asset.provider in ($FilteredProvider)

| fields Protected, repositoryName, registryURL, xdm.asset.name as Name, imageTags, Architecture, OS, xdm.asset.strong_id as ResourceID, xdm.asset.type.name as Type, xdm.asset.provider as Regitry_Type, xdm.asset.realm as Cloud_Account, xdm.asset.tags as Tags, xdm.asset.last_observed as Last_Observed

| comp count (Name ) as Images by protected

| sort desc Protected   


| view graph type = pie xaxis = protected yaxis = Images valuecolor("Agentless Scan","#0019ff") valuecolor("Not Scanned/Protected","#ec012c")

dataset = asset_inventory
| filter xdm.asset.type.name in ("Container Registry")
| alter Scan_Status  = xdm.asset.raw_fields -> CWP["analysis-info__compliance_publisher"].scan_analysis_result
| alter AzurePublic = xdm.asset.raw_fields -> ["Platform Discovery"]["properties"].publicNetworkAccess
| alter AwsPublic = xdm.asset.raw_fields -> ["Platform Discovery"].public
| alter Public  = if (AzurePublic != null, AzurePublic,  AwsPublic != null , AwsPublic) 
| alter Repositories = xdm.asset.raw_fields -> ["Platform Discovery"]["repositories"][]
| alter Protected = if (Scan_Status = "success", "Agentless Scan", Scan_Status = null , "Unknown") 
| alter Group_ID = coalesce(xdm.asset.tags -> ["Group_ID"], "None")
| alter Application = coalesce(xdm.asset.tags -> ["Application"], "None")
| alter ApplicationCI = coalesce(xdm.asset.tags -> ["ApplicationCI"], "None")
| alter Application_Owner = coalesce(xdm.asset.tags -> ["Application_Owner"], "None")
| alter Environment = coalesce(xdm.asset.tags -> ["Environment"], "None")
| alter Environment= uppercase(Environment)
| alter Function = coalesce(xdm.asset.tags -> ["Function"], "None")
| filter Protected in ($FilteredProtected)
| filter Group_ID in ($FilteredGroup_ID)
| filter Application in ($FilteredApplication)
| filter Application_Owner in ($FilteredApplication_Owner)
| filter Environment in ($FilteredEnvironment)
| filter xdm.asset.realm in ($FilteredRealm)
| filter xdm.asset.provider in ($FilteredProvider)
| fields Protected,  Public, xdm.asset.name as Name,  xdm.asset.strong_id as ResourceID, xdm.asset.type.name as Type, xdm.asset.provider as Regitry_Type, xdm.asset.realm as Cloud_Account, Repositories, xdm.asset.tags as Tags, xdm.asset.last_observed as Last_Observed
| comp count (Name ) as Registries by protected
| sort desc Registries 



| view graph type = pie xaxis = protected yaxis = Registries valuecolor("Unknown","#ec0101")

//| filter xdm.asset.provider  = "azure"
| alter scanType = xdm.asset.raw_fields -> CWP["analysis-info_csa_vulnerability_analyzer"].scanner_type

| alter Agentless = xdm.asset.raw_fields -> CWP["analysis-info_agentless_vulnerability_analyzer"].scanner_type
| alter Owner = xdm.asset.raw_fields -> ["Platform Discovery"]["image"].imageOwnerAlias
// | alter ImageTags = xdm.asset.raw_fields -> ["Platform Discovery"]["image"].tags[]
| alter Platform = xdm.asset.raw_fields -> ["Platform Discovery"]["image"].platformDetails
| alter Backup = xdm.asset.tags -> ["aws:backup:source-resource"]

| alter Group_ID = coalesce(xdm.asset.tags -> ["Group_ID"], "None")
| alter Application = coalesce(xdm.asset.tags -> ["Application"], "None")

| comp count (Name ) as Repositories by protected
| sort desc Repositories   








| view graph type = pie xaxis = protected yaxis = Repositories valuecolor("Agentless Scan","#5400ff")

dataset = asset_inventory
| filter xdm.asset.type.name in ("Container Image", "Runtime Image")
| alter 
    agentless_image_scan = xdm.asset.raw_fields -> CWP["scan_information_agentless_caa"].type,
    agent_image_scan = xdm.asset.raw_fields -> CWP["scan_information_csa_caa"].type,
    Agentless_Scan_Status = xdm.asset.raw_fields -> CWP["scan_information_agentless_caa"]["collected_types"][],
    CSA_Scan_Status = xdm.asset.raw_fields -> CWP["scan_information_csa_caa"]["collected_types"][],
    
    Agent_Scan_Status = xdm.asset.raw_fields -> CWP["analysis-info_csa_compliance_publisher"].scan_analysis_result
| alter Protected = "Not Scanned/Protected"
| alter Protected = if(Agent_Scan_Status = "success", "Agent Scan", Protected)
| alter Protected = if(agent_image_scan = "csa", "Agent Scan", Protected)
| alter Protected = if(Agentless_Scan_Status != null, "Agentless Scan", Protected)
// | alter Scan_Status = if(Agentless_Scan_Status != null, 
//                           arraystring(Agentless_Scan_Status, ", "), 
//                           Agent_Scan_Status)
| alter Group_ID = coalesce(xdm.asset.tags -> ["Group_ID"], "None")
| alter Application = coalesce(xdm.asset.tags -> ["Application"], "None")
| alter ApplicationCI = coalesce(xdm.asset.tags -> ["ApplicationCI"], "None")
| alter Application_Owner = coalesce(xdm.asset.tags -> ["Application_Owner"], "None")
| alter Environment = coalesce(xdm.asset.tags -> ["Environment"], "None")
| alter Environment= uppercase(Environment)
| alter Function = coalesce(xdm.asset.tags -> ["Function"], "None")
| filter Protected in ($FilteredProtected)

| filter Group_ID in ($FilteredGroup_ID)
| filter Application in ($FilteredApplication)
| filter Application_Owner in ($FilteredApplication_Owner)
| filter Environment in ($FilteredEnvironment)
| filter xdm.asset.realm in ($FilteredRealm)
| filter xdm.asset.provider in ($FilteredProvider)

| fields Group_ID, Application, ApplicationCI, Application_Owner, Environment, Function, Protected, Agentless_Scan_Status, Agent_Scan_Status, CSA_Scan_Status, xdm.asset.name as Name, xdm.asset.strong_id as ResourceID, xdm.asset.type.name as Type, xdm.asset.provider as Cloud, xdm.asset.realm as Cloud_Account, xdm.asset.cloud.region as Cloud_Region, xdm.asset.last_observed as Last_Observed
| comp count (Name ) as Container_Images by protected

| sort desc Protected 




| view graph type = pie xaxis = protected yaxis = Container_Images
